IndexPageText.title: %brand% — Online Image Cleanup: Remove Background Colors, Shadows, Stickers
IndexPageText.description: %brand% is a free, privacy‑first image cleanup suite. Remove background colors, shadows, stickers/emojis, and export high‑quality images (PNG with transparency, JPG, WebP) — all in your browser, no signup.
IndexPageText.descriptionBelowH1Text: Remove background colors, shadows, and stickers/emojis — free, no signup.
IndexPageText.toolShadowDesc: Automatically detect and remove harsh shadows to improve lighting and clarity. Ideal for product shots and portraits.
IndexPageText.toolEmojiDesc: Erase stickers, emojis, and overlays without damaging the underlying content. Great for social posts and screenshots.
IndexPageText.toolColorDesc: Precisely remove a target color and similar shades. Make backgrounds transparent and export clean images (PNG/JPG/WebP).
IndexPageText.positioningDesc: A lightweight, privacy‑first online image cleanup suite that runs entirely in your browser. Fast, free, and ideal for quick edits without uploading files.
IndexPageText.user1: E‑commerce sellers — clean product backgrounds for listings
IndexPageText.user2: Designers & marketers — quick edits for campaigns and mockups
IndexPageText.user3: Social creators — remove stickers and color casts for posts
IndexPageText.user4: Students & teachers — prepare images for slides and assignments
IndexPageText.user5: Developers — prototype assets without leaving the browser
IndexPageText.intro1: Remove a specific color or make backgrounds transparent
IndexPageText.intro2: Eliminate shadows to improve lighting and clarity
IndexPageText.removeWhatDesc: See examples of removing colors, shadows, and stickers.
IndexPageText.why1Desc: Start editing immediately without creating an account.
IndexPageText.why2Desc: All tools are completely free for everyone.
IndexPageText.why3Desc: Your photos are processed locally in your browser for privacy.
IndexPageText.faqSubtitle: Answers to common questions about privacy, cost, and capabilities.
IndexPageText.faq1Answer: It means removing unwanted elements like shadows, text, or objects from an image to make it look cleaner.
IndexPageText.faq3Answer: No, we process images locally in your browser to ensure your privacy.
IndexPageText.faq4Question: Can I make the background transparent?
IndexPageText.faq4Answer: Yes. Use Remove Color to target background hues; choose PNG to preserve transparency, or JPG/WebP if transparency isn’t needed.
IndexPageText.faq5Question: How do I get smoother edges?
IndexPageText.faq5Answer: Use Refine to smooth and feather the mask. Increase strength for softer edges on complex backgrounds.
IndexPageText.faq6Question: Does it work on large images?
IndexPageText.faq6Answer: Yes, modern browsers handle high‑resolution images well; performance depends on device.
IndexPageText.howTitleHome: How to Use Cleanup Pictures — Step by Step

IndexPageText.websiteLoginDesc: We will send a verification code to your email.

CommonText.footerDescText: CleanupPictures.org - The best online tool to clean up your images.

ToolPageText.uploadDesc: Drag & drop or click to upload (JPG, PNG, WEBP)
ToolPageText.uploadSubDesc: Instantly remove solid background colors with one click. Simple and easy.
ToolPageText.step1Sub: Upload your images from your device or computer (JPG/PNG/WebP).
ToolPageText.step2Sub: Pick color, adjust tolerance or run clean; auto‑refine improves edges.
ToolPageText.step3Sub: Download as PNG (transparent), JPG, or WebP. Choose PNG to keep transparency.
ToolPageText.tolTip: Increase to include more similar shades; may affect fine details
ToolPageText.refineTip: Smooth and feather the mask to reduce jagged edges
ToolPageText.autoRefineTip: Automatically adapts refine strength based on image; disable to use slider only
ToolPageText.promptMask: Please paint over the shadow area first.

RemoveShadowPage.title: Remove Shadow from Photo Online – Free Shadow Reduction Tool
RemoveShadowPage.description: Reduce harsh shadows and improve lighting in your photos online. No Photoshop required. Adjust shadow strength and download instantly.
RemoveShadowPage.aboutDesc: The 'Remove Shadow from Photo' tool is a smart utility designed to reduce harsh shadows and balance uneven lighting in your images. Whether it's a portrait with dark face shadows or a product photo with distracting cast shadows, this tool helps you recover details and improve clarity. It processes images locally in your browser for maximum privacy and supports JPG, PNG, and WebP formats.
RemoveShadowPage.featureDesc: Our tool uses advanced algorithms to detect and soften dark areas without washing out the rest of the image. It's perfect for fixing lighting mistakes, enhancing real estate photos, or cleaning up product shots. No software installation needed—just upload and adjust.
RemoveShadowPage.useCasesDesc:
• **Portraits**: Fix dark shadows on faces caused by harsh sunlight or bad lighting.
• **Product Photography**: Soften cast shadows to make products look more professional.
• **Real Estate**: Brighten dark corners and balance lighting in room interiors.
• **Documents**: Remove shadows from scanned documents or photos of paper.
RemoveShadowPage.settingBiasDesc: Adjusts the balance between shadow detection and preservation. Higher values target more areas.
RemoveShadowPage.how1: Upload a JPG, PNG, or WebP image.
RemoveShadowPage.how2: The tool automatically detects and reduces shadows.
RemoveShadowPage.how3: Adjust the **Strength** slider to fine-tune the result.
RemoveShadowPage.how4: Use **Aggressive** mode if shadows are stubborn.
RemoveShadowPage.how5: Download your improved photo as JPG, PNG, or WebP.
RemoveShadowPage.faq1A: Shadow reduction softens dark areas and balances lighting so photos look more natural. It recovers details hidden in the dark without over-exposing the bright areas.
RemoveShadowPage.faq2Q: Is this the same as removing shadows completely?
RemoveShadowPage.faq2A: Not exactly. It reduces the *intensity* of harsh shadows to make them look softer and less distracting. Completely removing a shadow often makes an object look like it's floating.
RemoveShadowPage.faq3A: No. Everything runs directly in your browser. It's free and easy to use.
RemoveShadowPage.faq4A: No. We process images locally in your browser to ensure your privacy. They are never uploaded to our servers.
RemoveShadowPage.faq5A: We support JPG, PNG, and WebP images. You can also export in these formats.
RemoveShadowPage.faq6Q: Does it work on large images?
RemoveShadowPage.faq6A: Yes, modern browsers handle high-resolution images well; performance depends on your device.
RemoveShadowPage.faq7A: No. Downloads are clean and watermark-free.
RemoveShadowPage.sampleDesc: See how the tool improves lighting on these examples.
RemoveShadowPage.sample1Desc: Reduce harsh shadows on building facades to reveal details.
RemoveShadowPage.sample2Desc: Balance uneven lighting on faces for a better look.
RemoveShadowPage.settingStrengthDesc: Adjusts the intensity of shadow removal. Higher values remove more shadow but may affect local contrast.
RemoveShadowPage.settingAggressiveDesc: Enables a more aggressive algorithm for deep or hard shadows.
RemoveShadowPage.howToUseDesc: Follow these simple steps to clean up your images.
RemoveShadowPage.step1Desc: Drag & drop or click to upload your photo.
RemoveShadowPage.step2Desc: Use the Strength slider or Aggressive mode to tune the result. You can also paint a mask to target specific areas.
RemoveShadowPage.step3Desc: Export your improved image as JPG, PNG, or WebP.
RemoveShadowPage.promptMask: Please paint over the shadow area first.

RemoveEmojiPage.title: Remove Emoji from Image Online - CleanupPictures.org
RemoveEmojiPage.description: Remove emojis, stickers, and doodles from images instantly.
RemoveEmojiPage.aboutDesc: Clear up your images by removing emojis and stickers that cover the content.
RemoveEmojiPage.faq1A: Yes, it works perfectly on mobile browsers.

RemoveColorPage.title: Remove Color from Image Online - Free Transparent Background Tool
RemoveColorPage.description: Easily remove color from image online for free. Our tool lets you make specific colors transparent, remove backgrounds, and download as PNG/WebP. No signup needed.
RemoveColorPage.aboutDesc: The 'Remove Color from Image' tool is a powerful, browser-based utility designed to make any color in your image transparent. Whether you need to remove a solid background, erase a specific color, or create a transparent overlay, this tool gives you pixel-perfect control. It functions as a precise color eraser and background remover, supporting PNG, JPG, and WebP formats. All processing happens locally on your device for maximum privacy.
RemoveColorPage.settingToleranceDesc:
Determines how strictly the tool matches the color you selected. 
• **Low (0-20%)**: Removes only the exact color and very close shades. Use this for precise work where the subject has colors similar to the background.
• **High (21-100%)**: Removes a broader range of related colors. Use this for uneven lighting, gradients, or shadows to effectively delete background color.
RemoveColorPage.settingRefineDesc:
Controls the softness of the edges after color removal.
• **Low (0-10%)**: Sharp, hard edges. Good for geometric shapes or pixel art.
• **High (11-100%)**: Soft, feathered edges. Essential for hair, fur, or blending the subject into a new background seamlessly.
RemoveColorPage.settingAutoDesc: Uses an intelligent algorithm to automatically detect and remove the dominant background color. It's the fastest way to make image transparent for simple images with solid backgrounds.
RemoveColorPage.settingAutoRefineDesc: When enabled, the tool automatically calculates the best Refine Strength based on your image's resolution and complexity. Disable it to take full manual control of the edge smoothing.
RemoveColorPage.featureTitle: Why Use Our Tool to Remove Color from Image?
RemoveColorPage.featureDesc: Our online tool is the fastest way to remove color from image without Photoshop. Whether you need to remove a solid background, extract a logo, erase unwanted colors, or create transparent overlays, our AI-assisted algorithm handles it instantly. Support for PNG, JPG, and WebP formats ensures high-quality results for e-commerce, design, and social media.
RemoveColorPage.useCasesTitle: Common Use Cases for Color Removal
RemoveColorPage.useCasesDesc:
• **E-commerce**: Remove background color from product photos for clean listings.
• **Logos**: Convert JPG logos with white backgrounds to transparent PNGs.
• **Design**: Extract specific elements by color for composite images or erase color from icons.
• **Photography**: Fix white balance or remove unwanted color casts from photos.
RemoveColorPage.how1: Upload a JPG, PNG, or WebP image.
RemoveColorPage.how2: Click the processed image to pick the color to remove.
RemoveColorPage.how3: Adjust Tolerance to widen or narrow similar shades.
RemoveColorPage.how4: Click again to remove more colors or leftover artifacts.
RemoveColorPage.how5: Use Undo or Reset Edits to refine.
RemoveColorPage.how6: Download as PNG/WebP (transparent) or JPG (no transparency).
RemoveColorPage.faq1Q: How do I remove a specific color from an image?
RemoveColorPage.faq1A: Upload your image, click the color on the processed result image to remove it. Adjust Tolerance to include similar shades, then download as PNG/WebP to keep transparency, or JPG if transparency isn’t needed.
RemoveColorPage.faq2Q: Is this tool free to use?
RemoveColorPage.faq2A: Yes, our Remove Color tool is completely free. There are no hidden fees, no credit card required, and no watermarks on your downloaded images. It's a free online color remover accessible to everyone.
RemoveColorPage.faq3Q: Can I remove the white background from a logo?
RemoveColorPage.faq3A: Absolutely! This is one of the best use cases. Just click on the white background, and it will become transparent instantly. This is perfect for converting logos to transparent PNGs.
RemoveColorPage.faq4A: Yes. We process all images locally within your web browser using advanced canvas technology. Your photos are never uploaded to any server, ensuring 100% privacy.
RemoveColorPage.faq5Q: Why is the background not transparent after download?
RemoveColorPage.faq5A: Please ensure you choose PNG or WebP format. JPG does not support transparency and will fill the background with white.
RemoveColorPage.faq6Q: How do I fix jagged edges?
RemoveColorPage.faq6A: Try adjusting the Refine slider. Increasing the value smoothes and feathers the edges for a cleaner look.
RemoveColorPage.faq7Q: Can I remove uneven background colors?
RemoveColorPage.faq7A: Yes. Increase the Tolerance to cover more shades, or click multiple times on different parts of the background to remove them step by step.
RemoveColorPage.sampleDesc: Click any sample below to load it into the editor and see the background removal result instantly.
RemoveColorPage.sample1Desc: Easily remove complex backgrounds. After loading, simply click "Auto Remove BG" or click directly on the sky background in the result image to instantly isolate the bird with a transparent background.
RemoveColorPage.sample2Desc: Fast sky replacement for architecture. Perfect for post-processing. Load the image, adjust settings, and click the background area to clear the original sky in one click. Preserves edge details for natural-looking replacements.
RemoveColorPage.sample3Desc: Precise color extraction for scenarios like education. Teaching colors? To remove just the green ring from this rainbow toy, simply load the image and click the green part. Instantly erase specific colors while keeping others intact.
